name: Fields of Battle 2
description:
Build your own Paintball Park. Battle other players in live PvP multiplayer. Compete in Daily Tournaments and Monthly Leagues for the top spot and prizes!

The #1 Extreme Sports First-Person Shooter franchise, Greg Hastings Paintball, is back and better than ever!

If you're a first-person shooter fan, Fields of Battle 2 will satisfy your desire to blast the competition. With ground-breaking motion and gesture controls including sliding, diving, leaning out from cover, throwing grenades, and more, this long-awaited sequel once again advances the mobile shooter experience to the next level.

Think you know shooters? This takes real skill - one hit, one elimination. Pick your cover, adjust for wind, angle your shot, and start sending paint. There's no auto-aim here, it's PURE skill and PURE action!

* FREE to start creating your field and playing in multiplayer tournaments
* Play LIVE PvP against players from around the world
* Build your own paintball field in YOUR style - speedball, woodsball, or recball, with tons of realistic bunkers, buildings, even a castle!
* Unlock new field items and HERO skins as you advance
* Real life paintball gear, including automatic, burst mode, Mag-fed, MilSim, and speedball markers, and don't forget the PAINT GRENADES
* Intuitive motion and gesture controls with full HUD and control customization

Visit our official site at http://www.gregredhastings.com
